short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal app that would compact your HTML code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal app that would compact your HTML code. You just need to put your beautified code into the box and press the button. That's it! It will display the compact version of your code that you can use anywhere.
